hey guys, just finished DLding recently and was pretty dissapointed to find a few out of sync. (the uploader is not to blame though, as these things do happen!) however I have found a quick and easy solution. use VLC media player and its inbuilt function to work out how far off the sound is in milliseconds, then use MKVMerge (a free program) and load the files. when the video file is loaded just click on the audio file, go to the bottom and click on the "format specific options" tab enter how far out it was in MS under under the "Delay (in ms)" box, click "Start Muxing" and it will output a new file in a matter of seconds! just tried with Tarzan with an offset of -5200ms and it worked perfectly and took about 15 seconds! :D anyway, hope that helps someone else out too. other than that....
